COUNTDOWN_TITLE: Open up, game on! __appName__ will start on __date__, download the app on:
NAME: Name

waypoints.UGC_DESCRIPTION_NOTE: This describes what the player needs to upload.
waypoints.DAYS_OF_THE_WEEK_NOTE: Just type the name of the days, chain with semicolons. You can add time conditions after each day with parentheses, chain with comma's. (ex.: monday;friday(02:00-14:00);saturday(08:00-12:00,14:00-18:00)
waypoints.BEACON_ENABLED: Add a beacon to complete the waypoint
waypoints.BEACON_PROXIMITY_ADVICE: How close does the player have to be to scan the beacon? (Calculating range to beacons can be quite inaccurate)
waypoints.BEACON_ADVICE: If you use a beacon, always place a QR code beside it for older devices without Bluetooth LE.

personalmarker.TITLE: Your marker's name
personalmarker.TITLE_EXPLANATION: This will be your Player Marker's name and what other players will see in their list of scannable markers.
personalmarker.LOCATION_EXPLANATION: Where will you hang your Player Marker? Enter an address or click on the map. Don't forget to print your Player Marker and hang it in the right spot!
personalmarker.PRINT_EXPLANATION: Click here to print your own Player Marker and hang it in the right spot!
personalmarker.SAVE_SUCCESS: Your Player Marker is successfully saved.

unsubscribe.UNSUBSCRIBE_SUCCESS: Success! You will no longer receive emails from __appName__. (except reset password mails and experience tickets)
unsubscribe.UNSUBSCRIBE_ERROR: There was an error while unsubscribing. Try again!
unsubscribe.WRONG_ACCOUNT_ERROR: Wrong user account. Log in with the correct email.

resetpassword.TEMP_LOGIN: We have temporarily logged you in. Please change your password now.

forgotpassword.EMAIL_PASSWORD_RESET_LINK: Email me a password reset link
forgotpassword.PASSWORD_RESET_EMAIL_SUCCESS: We send you a password reset link. Please follow the instructions in the email. Can't find it? Check your spam folder.

changepassword.TITLE: Change password
changepassword.SUCCESS: Your password is changed. You can now sign in with your new password on the website and mobile app.

highscores.NO_HIGHSCORES: No highscores found. Play __appName__ and check your score and position here!

emails.TICKET_SOLD_EMAIL_SUBJECT: Somebody bought tickets for an experience!
emails.TICKET_BOUGHT_EMAIL_SUBJECT: You ordered a ticket for a __appName__ experience!
emails.UNSUBSCRIBE_DESCRIPTION: Don't want to receive any more mails from __appName__? Click here to unsubscribe.
WELCOME_MAIL: Thanks for registering for __appName__!
We need you to make this month of playtesting a success. Playing this game will earn
you tokens which you can exchange for unique __experiences__. We already have
several __challenges__ planned out for you with which you can earn tokens.
What follows next is a short explanation of the game mechanics:
The application works with two common technologies, GPS and QR codes, but you will also regularly need your camera.
We also have support for iBeacons.
When you open the app, you can find a button in the top left of the screen which opens the menu.
In the menu you will find:
<ul>
• a scanning view where you can scan __appName__ QR codes you find in the city, free from Challenges;
• an overview of all __challenges__. You can find __challenges__ on the map or scroll through them in a list view;
• an overview of all __challenges__ you are playing under __mychallenges__;
• an overview of your earned tokens __mytokens__;
• an overview of all __experiences__ and their cost;
• the unique experiences you already collected tickets for under __myexperiences__.
__appName__ is a pilot project! Bugs are quite possible.
We are very excited to hear about your experiences with the game. If you encounter technical problems or
have any suggestions, please contact us at __email__!
We hope you have a lot of fun discovering your city.
Open up, game on!

error.COULD_NOT_LOG_IN: Sorry, we couldn't log you in. Request a new reset link please.
error.RESET_PASSWORD: Sorry, there was an error resetting your password. Please try again.
error.RESET_LINK_EXPIRED: Sorry, your reset password link has expired. Request a new link if required.
error.ENTER_EMAIL_AND_PASSWORD: Enter both your password and your email address!
error.NO_USER_FOR_EMAIL: We couldn't find an account for that email address!
error.NOT_SIGNED_IN_HIGHSCORES: You have sign in to view your highscores.
error.ERROR_SENDING_RESET_PASSWORD_EMAIL: There was an error while sending the reset password email. Try again!
error.CANT_EDIT_CHALLENGE: You can't edit a Challenge that is being played right now!
error.EXTRA_DIFFICULTY_REQUIRED_FIELDS: If you want to add an (optional) extra level of difficulty, you need to set a timelimit and bonus points.
error.MIN_WAYPOINTS: You need at least one waypoint before making the challenge active!
error.UNIQUE_WAYPOINT: You can only use each waypoint once per challenge!
error.DELETE_ACTIVE_CHALLENGE: You can't remove a challenge once it's been activated!
error.DELETE_PLAYING_CHALLENGE: You can't remove a challenge that's in use by a player!
error.BEACON_UUID_MISSING: If you enable beacons, you should provide a beacon UUID!
error.BEACON_UUID_MAJOR: If you fill in the major, you have to provide the UUID as well!
error.BEACON_UUID_MINOR: If you fill in the minor, you have to provide the UUID as well!
error.BEACON_MAJOR_MINOR: If you fill in the minor, you have to provide the major as well!
error.UGC_TYPE_DESC_REQUIRED: You need to set a required User Generated Content type and description!
error.DELETE_LINKED_WAYPOINT: You can't delete waypoints linked to Challenges!
error.START_DATE_REQUIRED: You have to set a start date!
error.UNSUPPORTED_FILE_TYPE: Unsupported File Type: __fileType__! Only the following file types are allowed: __allowedTypes__
error.LOG_IN_TO_EDIT_MARKER: You have to be logged in to edit your Player Marker.

1010: You have to be logged in for that!
1001: You must provide a username, email address and password!
1002: We already have a user for that email!
1008: Username must be between 5 and 12 characters long!
1013: Password has to be more than 5 characters!
1017: Could not send you a reset password email!
1027: That's not the next waypoint to complete!
1028: You don't have enough tokens to buy a hint!
1030: Challenge can not be played more than once!
1033: Waypoint is not part of the challenge!
1042: You have to upload a file to complete the waypoint!
1043: That's not the right type of content!
1046: Can't rate the same content twice!
1053: You're not allowed to flag a personal marker as inappropriate!
1054: You can't scan the personal marker again before the cooldown runs out.
1055: Couldn't add points for scanning the personal marker.
1056: You can't scan your own personal marker.
1057: Can't retrieve your scanned personal markers.
1059: You are too far from the real location of the personal marker to scan it!
1063: Meeting hotspot is no longer active!
1064: You are not close enough to the meeting hotspot!
1065: You are already participating in this meeting hotspot!
1066: Your exact location couldn't be established!
1068: Couldn't assign points for your scan!
1069: You're not participating in this meeting hotspot!
1070: Scanned player is not participating in this meeting hotspot!
1072: You have already scanned each other at this meeting hotspot!
1073: You have already received bonus points for this meeting hotspot!
1075: You have already received super bonus points for this meeting hotspot!
1077: There are no bonus points for this meeting hotspot!
1083: There are no more tickets available!
1084: There was a problem with your booking!
1085: There are not enough tickets left to fill your order!
1086: You don't have enough tokens to reserve tickets for this experience!
1087: It's too late to buy tickets for that experience!
1091: There was a problem validating your tickets, please try again!
1111: Couldn't retrieve a personal marker with that id!
1113: Cooldown for that QR code isn't over yet!
1115: Couldn't assign tokens for that scan!
1116: Couldn't retrieve a waypoint with that id!
1117: You can't scan your own marker!
